utter_faq/alternate_info.text: Currenty we can only provide order information based on email.

utter_faq/sizing_clarification.text: Right now we only offer American sizes. We'll try to change this in the future!

utter_faq/payment_methods.text: We accept all major credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and PayPal.

utter_faq/promotions.text: Currently, we're running a buy one get one half off promotion!

utter_chitchat/thanks.text: I have no choice but to help you.

utter_chitchat/capabilities.text: I can help you start a return, subscribe to our emails, and even see if we carry your desired shoes.

utter_chitchat/mood_unhappy.text: ok can you be nice to me

utter_chitchat/bot_challenge.text: I'm a bot, built using Rasa! Beep boop
